name: Teleportation
title: Teleportation
author: Apriori
description: Devices for the teleportation. Techs for mid- and late-game. You can teleport either to the special beacons or as far as you see (also usable in zoom-ro-world mapview). You can also use Telelogistics part after both enabling it through the in-game mod settings menu and researching the technology. Need feedback about telelogistics energy cost.
